summary.para: The SecPkgContext_IssuerListInfoEx structure holds a list of trusted certification authorities (CAs). This structure is used by the Schannel security package function.
This attribute is supported only by the Schannel security support provider (SSP).
This attribute is available only to client applications and can be queried only after a call to the function returns the value SEC_E_INCOMPLETE_CREDENTIALS.
A pointer to an array of CERT_NAME_BLOB structures that contains a list of the names of CAs that the server trusts.
When you have finished using the data in this array, free it by calling the function.

member.name: SecPkgContext_IssuerListInfoEx.cIssuers
member.summary: The number of names in aIssuers.
